Title: Torn Diary 1
Text:
July 4
The citywide alarm blared incessantly throughout the day, sounding three to four times. Yōu was so frightened that she clung to me tightly, refusing to let go. I felt powerless in comforting her, so I held her even tighter.
We're leaving tomorrow, and I hope everything can go smoothly, allowing Yōu to get a restful night's sleep.
